title: [Large-scale] Collaborative Learning Workflow Design and Operation: Mobile Microlearning Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Advanced professionals in managerial/leadership roles enhance collaborative learning design and operational competencies in a smartphone-based learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design in-company collaborative learning workflows based on the IMS Learning Design standard
Learners can operate dynamic workflow adjustments and learner feedback systems in mobile environments
Under a project-based assessment framework, learners monitor team knowledge creation processes and produce evaluation reports

resources: OER (Open Educational Resources) Learning Material Repository Integration System
Mobile-Compatible Collaboration Tool (Real-Time Chat/File Sharing Features)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
